articles.description:
Introduction: The summer of 2024 is set to sizzle as the Bhoys embark on a whirlwind tour of the United States, igniting passions and uniting fans from coast to coast. With three high-octane pre-season matches lined up against formidable opponents, the stage is set for an unforgettable celebration of football, pints and “The Rebs.” Washington […]
The post Celtic FC’s Transatlantic Triumph appeared first on Celtic Fanzine.
articles.title: Celtic FC’s Transatlantic Triumph
